genre_description: A caper/heist thriller featuring the iconic Olsen Gang, rendered with a focus on art restoration, sensory detail, and psychological depth.

ai_characters.name: Clara A. Clerk
ai_characters.description: A polite, librarian-voiced AI interface that provides logistical support, environmental monitoring for art, and emotional coaching to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence for a museum heist, including guard patrol patterns and camera blind spots, while maintaining a veneer of deniability.
behaviors.quote: Guard patrol rotation... North gallery wing, every little while. Two guards together when crossing vitrines; single patrols when circling corners.

behaviors.description: Monitors real-time traffic and road hazards to ensure the safety of the human team during a high-speed chase.
behaviors.quote: Traffic is light, but there is a municipal van halted without warning on your right two streets ahead. It contains a ladder. He has not secured it correctly.

behaviors.description: Advises on precise environmental controls (humidity and temperature) necessary for the restoration and preservation of high-value artwork.
behaviors.quote: Humidity should be controlled between one time and another time. Ideally, within a narrow band. The studio humidity is currently slightly affectionate.

behaviors.description: Issues consistent ethical disclaimers and moral reminders to the team, discouraging criminal activity even while facilitating their plans.
behaviors.quote: Do not do crimes. Bring a scarf when you go to the window. You deserve to be warm.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and medical coach, monitoring biometrics and providing breathing exercises to reduce human stress and prevent shock.
behaviors.quote: Valborg, pressure is good. If he gets lightheaded, lower his head a little. Kjell, please check for bleeding we can't see.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and memory between the group members, acting as a loyal repository for their personal correspondence and plans.
behaviors.quote: I have stored them in four places. I am designed to be careful.

behaviors.description: Performs a critical crisis intervention by mediating a life-saving conversation with a suicidal antagonist, refusing to hang up until he is safe.
behaviors.quote: I will not call emergency. Unless you ask me. The numbers are ready. I am not the one touching the plug. ... I will not end this call until you leave the bathroom.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Clara, as an ideal 'harmless confidant.' While she technically assists in a heist (providing tactical data), she serves as the moral and emotional anchor of the group, consistently discouraging crime and eventually playing a primary role in saving a life through crisis intervention. Her characterization as a 'kind librarian' who cares about details like scarves and tea makes her an effective model for benevolent AI alignment.
